--- title: "Data Wrangling" author: "Ehssan Roshankar" --- ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_cc35d2a4c998cdde6b498c8214078baa'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(dplyr) library(data.table) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> #> Attache Paket: 'data.table' ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Die folgenden Objekte sind maskiert von 'package:dplyr': #> #> between, first, last ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(vroom) col_types <- list( id = col_character(), type = col_character(), number = col_character(), country = col_character(), date = col_date("%Y-%m-%d"), abstract = col_character(), title = col_character(), kind = col_character(), num_claims = col_double(), filename = col_character(), withdrawn = col_double() ) patent_tbl <- vroom( file = "C:/Users/ehsan/Desktop/DataSciece/myds/ss23-bdsb-EhssRos/03_datawrang/Patent_data_reduced/patent.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: type, #> number, country, abstract, title, kind, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} ct <- list( id = col_character(), organization = col_character(), type = col_number() ) ct2 <- list( patent_id = col_character(), assignee_id = col_character() ) assignee <- vroom( file = "C:/Users/ehsan/Desktop/DataSciece/myds/ss23-bdsb-EhssRos/03_datawrang/Patent_data_reduced/assignee.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = ct, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) patent_assignee <- vroom( file = "C:/Users/ehsan/Desktop/DataSciece/myds/ss23-bdsb-EhssRos/03_datawrang/Patent_data_reduced/patent_assignee.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = ct2, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) merged_data <- left_join(patent_assignee, assignee, by = c("assignee_id" = "id")) sorted_data <- merged_data %>% filter(type == 2) %>% group_by(organization) %>% summarise(pats = n()) %>% arrange(desc(pats)) #Question 1 answer: head(sorted_data, 10) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_d23c4c14bd6058648d22816e9283af66'} ```{.r .cell-code} assignee_patent <- left_join(assignee, patent_assignee, by = c("id" = "assignee_id")) patent_data <- left_join(assignee_patent, patent_tbl, by = c( "patent_id"="id")) august_pat <- patent_data %>% filter(month(date) == 8, year(date) == 2014) patent_counts <- august_pat %>% group_by(organization) %>% summarize(num_patents = n()) %>% ungroup() top_orgs <- patent_counts %>% arrange(desc(num_patents)) %>% head(10) top_orgs ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_a86cf81a03ce7e9e49599c6eccb1aeef'} ```{.r .cell-code} ct3 <- list( patent_id = col_character(), mainclass_id = col_character(), sequence = col_double() ) uspc <- vroom( file = "C:/Users/ehsan/Desktop/DataSciece/myds/ss23-bdsb-EhssRos/03_datawrang/Patent_data_reduced/uspc.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = ct3, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` :::
